alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Madison; Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Otsego; Southern Oneida; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 1:45PM EST until December 18 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Sullivan, Delaware, Otsego, Northern Oneida, Onondaga, Madison and Southern Oneida counties. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow continues north of the warm front in northern Oneida County with mixed precipitation along the NY thruway corridor. Pockets of freezing rain continue in the Catskills.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Delaware; Madison; Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Otsego; Southern Oneida; Sullivan
